name: Database Security Hardening
description: Enforce database security best practices such as encryption, access controls, and audit logging.

name: Insider Threat Detection
description: Deploy monitoring tools and behavior analytics to detect and mitigate insider threats.

name: Wireless Network Security
description: Ensure secure configurations for wireless networks, including WPA3 encryption and MAC filtering.

name: Cyber Resilience Framework
description: Develop a cyber resilience strategy to ensure business continuity during cyber incidents.

name: Automated Incident Response
description: Use SOAR (Security Orchestration, Automation, and Response) to automate incident response processes.

name: Web Browser Security
description: Implement secure web browser settings to prevent drive-by downloads and malicious scripts.

name: Security Policy Enforcement
description: Enforce security policies across the organization using automated policy management tools.

name: Biometric Authentication
description: Leverage biometric authentication methods such as fingerprint and facial recognition for secure access.

name: Security in Mergers & Acquisitions
description: Assess cybersecurity risks and vulnerabilities during mergers, acquisitions, and divestitures.

name: Deepfake and Social Engineering Prevention
description: Implement awareness training and AI-based detection tools to prevent deepfake-related fraud and social engineering attacks.
